data_table.description: Venipuncture Form, VENA, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: VENC1
variable.description: [Blood drawing]. Have any bleeding disorders? Q1 [Venipuncture Form, VENC, Cohort Visit 3]

variable.name: VENC4
variable.description: [Blood drawing]. Was all blood drawn before the snack? Q4 [Venipuncture Form, VENC, Cohort Visit 3]

variable.name: VENC7
variable.description: [Blood drawing]. Was tourniquet reapplied? Q7 [Venipuncture Form, VENC, Cohort Visit 3]

variable.name: VENC13
variable.description: [Blood processing]. Comments on blood drawing. Q13 [Venipuncture Form, VENC, Cohort Visit 3]

variable.name: VENC14
variable.description: [Blood processing]. Paper incident record used? Q14 [Venipuncture Form, VENC, Cohort Visit 3]

variable.name: VENC5
variable.description: [Blood drawing]. Number of venipuncture attempts. Q5 [Venipuncture Form, VENC, Cohort Visit 3]

variable.name: VENC6
variable.description: [Blood drawing]. Filling time of tube 1 (seconds). Q6 [Venipuncture Form, VENC, Cohort Visit 3]

variable.name: VENCFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [Venipuncture Form, VENC, Cohort Visit 3]

variable.name: VENCCY
variable.description: Contact year [7] [Venipuncture Form, VENC, Cohort Visit 3]

variable.name: VENC10HM
variable.description: [Blood processing]. Time specimen tube 1 was spun. [Venipuncture Form, VENC, Cohort Visit 3]

variable.name: VENC11HM
variable.description: [Blood processing]. Time specimens were placed in freezer [Venipuncture Form, VENC, Cohort Visit 3]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Venipuncture Form, VENC, Cohort Visit 3]
